description: This Dart source file defines an admin orders management screen UI for a Flutter mobile application. It contains a stateless widget that constructs the Orders Management page with a header, placeholders for order list, filtering options, and actions, utilizing custom theme and responsive design components.

classes.name: AdminOrdersManagementScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the admin orders management page with header and order-related placeholders.

classes.name: _NeonSectionHeader
classes.description: A custom widget for the section header with gradient background, icon, title, and subtitle.

classes.name: _NeonPlaceholder
classes.description: A widget displaying a glow-effect container with an icon and text, used as a placeholder for order list and filters.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the main scaffold of the orders management screen, including app bar, header, and responsive layout with placeholders.
